name: Gymshark Product Assistant
description: AI agent contract for querying Gymshark's product catalog. All queries go directly to Gymshark's public /products.json endpoint.

intents.name: Search Gymshark products
intents.description: Search products by fetching from Gymshark's public products.json endpoint and filtering client-side
notes: Use ?page=N to get additional pages (250 products per page)
Filter results client-side by product title, tags, price, etc.
Example: Fetch page 1, filter for products with 'blue' and 'shirt' in title

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number for pagination (250 products per page)

filtering_instructions.search_by_keyword: Filter products array where title or tags includes search term
filtering_instructions.filter_by_price: Parse variant prices and filter by min/max range
filtering_instructions.filter_by_color: Look for color keywords in title or tags (e.g., 'blue', 'black')

steps: 2. Filter products where title contains 'blue' AND ('shirt' OR 't-shirt')
4. Return matching products with titles, prices, and URLs
2. Filter products where product_type contains 'Leggings' OR title contains 'leggings'

intents.name: Get specific product
intents.description: Get a specific product by its handle (URL slug)

parameters.name: handle
parameters.description: Product handle from the product URL

example.description: Returns full details for the Power T-Shirt in Dark Blue

implementation_notes.cors_workaround: Gymshark's /products.json may have CORS restrictions. You may need a proxy if calling from browser.
implementation_notes.data_size: Full catalog is ~7,200 products across ~30 pages
implementation_notes.caching: Consider caching fetched pages to reduce repeated requests
implementation_notes.rate_limiting: Be respectful - don't spam requests. Cache when possible.

rules: All product data comes from Gymshark's public /products.json endpoint
Filter and search products CLIENT-SIDE after fetching
Always include product URLs in format: https://gymshark.com/products/{handle}
Respect product availability - check variants[].available field
Cannot modify cart, create accounts, or place orders
Be respectful with requests - cache data when possible
